snippet: A college admission officer in the United States explains the types of extracurricular activities that American students often include on their college applications.
abstract: A college admission officer in the United States explains the types of extracurricular activities that American students often include on their college applications.

headline.main: For U.S. College Applicants, Extra Activities Are Encouraged

snippet: Behind two goals by Carli Lloyd, the United States defeated Japan to win its fourth gold medal in women’s soccer.
abstract: Behind two goals by Carli Lloyd, the United States defeated Japan to win its fourth gold medal in women’s soccer.

headline.main: U.S. Women's Soccer Team Defeats Japan for Gold Medal

snippet: Google's Nexus Q, a black ball meant to stream video and music, is the company's first try at building its own hardware. But as Claire Cain Miller reports on Thursday in The New York Times, Google's indefinite postponement of Nexus Q shipments las...
abstract: Google's Nexus Q, a black ball meant to stream video and music, is the company's first try at building its own hardware. But as Claire Cain Miller reports on Thursday in The New York Times, Google's indefinite postponement of Nexus Q shipments last week indicates the challenges it faces as it tries to move into hardware and social technology.

headline.main: Daily Report: A Stumble for Google With Media Player

snippet: A projected life-size image of a woman explains where to find taxi stands and baggage claim every time someone comes within 30 feet.
abstract: La Guardia Airport's newest employee, Marie, is a projected life-size avatar giving visitors directions to taxi stands, baggage claim and other useful information; an identical avatar was unveiled at Newark Liberty International Airport in July and a third is planned for Kennedy Airport as well.

headline.main: At La Guardia, a Smiling Helper Materializes, Digitally
headline.print_headline: La Guardia’s New Helper Repeats Herself

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey

snippet: The setback from the Nexus Q reveals deeper challenges for Google as it tries to move into two new areas: hardware and social technology.
abstract: Setback for Google's Nexus Q device for streaming video and music reveals deeper challenges for the company as it tries to move into two new areas: hardware and social technology; analysts say one problem is that most people have not purchased much in the way of music and movies from the firm.

headline.main: Google Goes Back to the Drawing Board for Nexus Q
headline.print_headline: Back to the Drawing Board for Nexus Q

snippet: The relegation of the financially troubled Glasgow Rangers to the lowest division of Scottish soccer may forever transform a heated rivalry with Celtic.
abstract: Relegation of the financially troubled Glasgow Rangers to the lowest division of Scottish soccer threatens to transform a long-time heated rivalry with Celtic.

snippet: Q. I know you can use the Windows Easy Transfer software to move your files and settings from an older Windows computer to a new Windows PC, but will it work for transferring files from a PC to a new Mac?A. Windows Easy Transfer is designed for tr...
abstract: Personal Tech Q&A on moving files from a Windows PC to a new Mac; also, editing and printing images in Adobe Photoshop Elements, and Tip of the Week on creating customized keyboard shortcuts to open specific programs on a Windows PC. (M)c
